title: Sex Tips For Girls
description: From Simon & Schuster, Sex Tips for Girls is Cynthia Heimel's must-have handbook for ladies on the hunt for love.Handed down from one generation to another, Sex Tips for Girls remains the hilarious, must-have handbook for any woman looking for a book on love. From from the sex-and-drugs-and-rock-and-roll diet to how to cure a broken heart, there is no better, funnier, truer guide to life, love, and the pursuit of men!
author: Cynthia Heimel
